QuestData.Title: WANTED: The Hornet
QuestData.Description:
That's it, I'm putting a bounty on that blasted hornet.
Somebody take that bug down!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: It's been halting our scouting parties in the area.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Mukkral Blackvein at the Wolf's Den.
